Study Title: Maintenance Therapy Using Lenalidomide in Myeloma
Primary Outcome Measures: Determine the efficacy of Revlimid® at prolonging the duration of the post-transplant response., 2 years
Secondary Outcome Measures: Assess the impact of Revlimid® on the post-transplant complete response rate, 2 years|Compare survival without events and overall survival of patients in the lenalidomide arm with the control, 2 years|Evaluate the long-term tolerance of Revlimid® in post-transplant maintenance therapy., 3 years
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: DOUBLE (PARTICIPANT, INVESTIGATOR)|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
